name: RiftScape: Shadows of Azazath
description:
An original, in-development prototype demo FPS for an upcoming game by Wize Wizard Games. Feedback is welcome.

Current Features:
  • Fight through 1 melee enemy type & 1 giant variant.
  • Picking up various weapons and items including:
    • The infamous Shotgun.
  • Explore the top of the Valawzy Windmill on the Kelemet Isle.
Planned Features:
  • New damage & health systems.
  • Inventory & equipment systems.
  • More weapon types including:
    • Swords
    • Bows
    • Dynamites
    • And more!
